articles.title: When Lukashenko called Prigozhin, German spies were listening: reports - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: A new investigation suggests the German intelligence service knew about the Wagner uprising before it occurred.
articles.content: The German intelligence service listened in as Yevgeny Prigozhin negotiated with Belarusian leader Alexander Lukashenko, on behalf of Russian President Vladimir Putin, to stop the Wagner Group’s marc… [+755 chars]

articles.title: Climate change is helping this new deadly virus to spread across Europe - Euronews
articles.description: Warmer temperatures are transforming Europe into the perfect habitat for ticks carrying CCHF, a deadly virus which in the worst cases results in death.
articles.content:

articles.title: Belarus Dismantling Three Russian Training Grounds, Satellite Images Show - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
